lines.text:
[returning a note he was given to read]
What does it say?
"Can we be overheard?" What's the matter with you, can't you read or something?
No, I have a monkey outside that can write better than that.
Do you know what I got in there?
What a time to run away, the dopey dog! I never liked dogs. You can't trust them. Women and dogs and kids. They'll always let you down!
Look at these absurd clothes your department have given me. Me, the third best dressed man in the whole world, four years running. Not even a collar!
You're supposed to be a gardner, not the Duke of Windsor!
